name: Oops! No Brakes
description:
Oops! No Brakes More Oops! Update

Oops! No Brakes is a non-stop racing obstacle course! Get to the flag at the end of each level! Sounds easy, but these cars don't have brakes! Collect coins and go for the fastest time you can manage! No brakes? No problem!

The More Oops! Update includes two new environments including the "Gloopy Grotto" and the "Spicy Shore"! You can skip to any environment from the beginning. There's also two new cars, a new soundtrack, numerous bug-fixes, and all the non-stop driving you can handle!

Controls:

  • Mouse - Rotate the car
  • R - Retry the level

Programming and Design by TheJaspel (https://twitter.com/thejaspel1)

Music by Zachary Pinkham (https://soundcloud.com/zachary-pinkham)

Originally made for the Kenney Jam 2021 - Theme: Rotation
